item.title: The tell all Q&A. You asked, we answered. | Sex.Life
item.description: Podcast Description It’s been a crazy journey, and we wanted to thank you all for coming along for the wild ride by opening up the mic to you. This episode you take control and ask all the questions, funny questions, serious questions and everything you wanted to know about the secret sex school. How do you become a somatic sexologist? item.title: Day 1: Welcome to Sex School | Sex.Life
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome to Sex.Life! In this episode (R18), somatic sexologist, Morgan Penn, and ZM’s Hayley Sproull start a wild journey to reveal what goes on behind the locked gates of a secret sex school in rural New Zealand. Day one at sex school includes unorthodox exercises, making love to the earth, getting nude and an elephant in the room. Before delving into the juicy details, they chat about Hayley's experience of Morgan taking her through her first yoni mapping exercise.

item.title: Sex.Life Trailer Season 1 Trailer | Sex.Life
item.description: Podcast Description Sex.Life is a podcast that will take you on a wild journey to expose what goes on behind the locked gates of a secret sex school in rural New Zealand. Join somatic sexologist Morgan Penn as she puts her body on the line and shares the jaw dropping experience with comedian Hayley Sproull. Each episode is a new day at sex school which reveals unorthodox exercises and interactions which provides a springboard for a discussion about sex and embracing sexuality.
